solution_line_template: The price of 1 kg of oranges is ${price_paid_initial} / {mass_purchased_initial} kg = $<<{price_paid_initial}/{mass_purchased_initial}={price_per_kg}>>{price_per_kg}/kg
So Ali will pay {mass_purchased_final} kg * ${price_per_kg}/kg = $<<{mass_purchased_final}*{price_per_kg}={total_cost_final}>>{total_cost_final} for {mass_purchased_final} kg of oranges.
